DOC.brief_summary: The combination constraint-induced movement therapy ( CIMT ) method complement hand arm bimanual training ( HABIT ) improve frequency quality cooperative hand use function child hemiplegic CP .
DOC.brief_title: Constraint-induced Movement Therapy Hand Arm Bimanual Training Children With Hemiplegic Cerebral Palsy ( CP )
DOC.criteria: active wrist extension/dorsiflexion least 20 ; MACS 13 ; GMFCS 12 ; enrol regular remedial level education ability understand instruction participate without parent presence . Exclusion criterion : seizure ; severely increase muscle tone ; hemi arm good ; orthopedic surgery upper extremity ; botulin toxin injection within past half year upper extremity ; inability understand instruction cognitive/behavior/concentration .
